videos.headline: Mullaney makes the nastiest of TD catches
videos.description: Alabama's Richard Mullaney skies in the back of the end zone to make a diving catch that was initially called incomplete but changed to a touchdown after video review.

videos.headline: Jones racks up second punt return TD of game
videos.description: Alabama's Cyrus Jones takes the punt off a hop and then goes 72 yards untouched for his second punt return touchdown of the day.
